#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define NL printf("\n")
#define mem(a,b) memset(a, b, sizeof(a))
#define ft first
#define sd second
using namespace std;
const ll mod = 1000000007;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
int dp[107][205][105][5];
ll fun(int run, int b, int n, int cnt){
    if(run>=100){
        return 1;
    }
    if(b<=0){
        return 0;
    }

    if(cnt<=0){
        return 0;
    }
    if(dp[run][b][n][cnt] != -1){
        return dp[run][b][n][cnt];
    }
    ll res=0;
    if(b>0){
        res = res+fun(run, b-1, n, cnt-1);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
        res = res+fun(run+1, b-1, n, 3);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
        res = res+fun(run+2, b-1, n, 3);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
        res = res+fun(run+4, b-1, n, 3);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
        res = res+fun(run+6, b-1, n, 3);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
    }

    if(n>0){
        res = res+fun(run, b, n-1, cnt);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
        res = res+fun(run+1, b, n-1, cnt);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
        res = res+fun(run+2, b, n-1, cnt);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
        res = res+fun(run+4, b, n-1, cnt);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
        res = res+fun(run+6, b, n-1, cnt);
        if(res>=mod) res-=mod;
    }

    //res = res%mod;
    return dp[run][b][n][cnt]=res;
}
int main(){
    //printf("Hello World..!\n");
    mem(dp, -1);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){

        int b, n;
        scanf("%d %d", &b, &n);
        ll ans = fun(0, b, n, 3);
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }

    return 0;

}
